title: The Lean Startup
subtitle: Eric Ries
content: The Lean Startup: How Today's Entrepreneurs Use Continuous Innovation to Create Radically Successful Businesses is a book by Eric Ries, first published in 2011. Ries introduces the concept of the lean startup methodology, which advocates for rapid experimentation, validated learning, and iterative product development. By embracing uncertainty and focusing on delivering value to customers, entrepreneurs can increase their chances of building sustainable and scalable businesses in today's fast-paced tech industry.
